mapper.sql: id, product_id, name, type_name, hours, start_date, end_date, times, status
mapper.select: select s.*, t.name as type_name from t_course_session as s left join t_course_type as t on s.type_id = t.id where s.id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
select s.*, t.name as type_name from t_course_session as s left join t_course_type as t on s.type_id = t.id where s.type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_course_session
id,
product_id,
name,
type_name,
hours,
start_date,
end_date,
times,
status,

mapper.update:
update t_course_session
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=CHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hours = #{hours,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE},
times = #{times,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update t_course_session set product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hours = #{hours,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, times = #{times,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
